# Jetbra
An activation tool for jetbrains family products,including plugins

# Notice
More than 30% of this project was copied from ja-netfilter, please refer to [ja-netfilter](https://gitee.com/ja-netfilter/ja-netfilter) for more details
So for users using ja-netfilter, there is no need to install this. You only need to add a new line of configuration in the `power.conf` configuration file to use the activation code generated by this project
```
EQUAL,,65537,->
```

# Usage

1. Download jetbra-all.zip from the release page and unzip it
2. Execute installation script
   macOS or Linux: execute "scripts/install.sh"<br>
   Windows: double click to execute "scripts\install-current-user.vbs" (For current user),"scripts\install-all-users.vbs" (For all users)
3. Log in again to load environment variables
4. Go to the web page to get the activation code and activate the software

For plugins, it is impossible for me to generate an activation code for each paid plugin, so I developed an
[tampermonkey script](https://greasyfork.org/zh-CN/scripts/480799-jetbra). You only need to install this script to generate an activation code by clicking on the plugin homepage.

![example](https://greasyfork.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/8aelgj5be9clyljja97c4mq3rjcg)
